title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Living Room Layout", ca. 1934–35
description: Plan for living room on Lady Esther Yacht. Descending staircase in upper left corner. Two tub chairs and circular table in upper left corner; cupboard and bookshelf on north wall. Modular wrap-around sofa in northeast corner of room with large circular coffee table at center. Drop-leaf desk in lower right corner near exit. Capehart radio/phonograph on south wall with storage for records. Three-seat sofa on south wall to left of radio/phonograph with end table at left. Bathroom (?) at upper right; indication of shower but no toilet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Living Room Layout", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-432.
